title: Easter, Christ, Richard Rohr, Pirsig - and Dynamic Quality (All at Once!)
description:
Dynamic Quality shows up everywhere!

Some links related to this video:
Fr. Richard Rohr’s Organization: https://cac.org
Cynthia Bourgeault: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=edceTL8dYVI and 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2FhgrGKIirc
Original video from All Saints Pasadena: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XU5f72VVvsg&t=30s
